column4: How long does it ussualy take until a bug (via launchpad) is fixed?
Or does the time greatly vary?
But there's probably something like a minimum
so it could take several months??? lol
well, it could be already fixed when reported, or it could take a year, it just depends
Aha. So you just have to wait?
sometimes bugs need more info, sometimes they are not usable at all and should be closed, sometimes there's testing needed etc
How do I now if more info or tests are needed?
(I want it to be fixed soon - so I'd help with all the information I have)
good question, devel should inform that, though common sense might tell something
anyway, depends on what is the bug
So I'd get an email (I reported it via launchpad)
